company_data.description: CloudTech provides SaaS solutions for enterprise workflow management and digital transformation
company_data.services: Software as a Service, API integrations, Cloud platforms, Workflow automation

scraped_content.homepage_text: Transform your business with cloud-native solutions that scale with your growth. Our enterprise-grade platform helps companies streamline operations and accelerate digital transformation.
scraped_content.about_page: Founded in 2018, CloudTech has been at the forefront of enterprise digital transformation. We serve Fortune 500 companies with mission-critical workflow solutions.
